channel.title: How do i add npc drops?
channel.description: I am trying to make drops now for my server... i just can make drops for some of the NPCs... This is what i'm doing: 1.going into npcdrops.cfg and changing the drop/ or or adding a new drop monster in there... I might be able to figure it out because theres 3 drops of the same kind for NPC ID 1 and a few for 2... it might be that u gotta make a new line each time u wanna make a new drop...

item.title: How do i add npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121

item.title: How do i add npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

I am trying to make drops now for my server… i just can make drops for some of the NPCs… This is what i’m doing:
1.going into npcdrops.cfg and changing the drop/ or or adding a new drop monster in there… I might be able to figure it out because theres 3 drops of the same kind for NPC ID 1 and a few for 2… it might be that u gotta make a new line each time u wanna make a new drop…

Read full topic
